text: (manitarkal ceyyum pavankalin karanamaka) avarkal mitu vanam vetittu (viluntu) vitavum kutum. (Annerattil) vanavarkalum (payantu) tankal iraivanaip pukalntu tuticeytu, pumiyil ullavarka(lin kurranka)lai mannikkumaru koruvarkal. (Manitarkal pavattiliruntu vilaki mannippaik korinal) niccayamaka allah mika mannippavan, maka karunaiyutaiyavan enpatai (napiye! Nir) arintu kolviraka
